sub_title: Group CFO / Managing Director at Kalli Trade B.V.
summary:
A dynamic and results-driven Senior Finance professional with a highly successful background in Accounting, in Financial and Business Analysis / Controlling and in Finance Operations in complex international teams for 24 years.
I am committed to achieving and exceeding demanding targets and business objectives while remaining focused on providing an exceptional standard of service to local or Regional clients by possessing excellent interpersonal and communication skills. I enjoy being part of a successful and productive team, leading it to success and I thrive in highly pressurized and challenging working environments.
I have a knack for analyzing business processes, to identify inefficiencies, and then coming up with ways to make them better. Aside from my technical abilities, my excellent communication skills allow me to communicate with people from all social and cultural backgrounds.

Specialties: Corporate Banking, Relationship Management, Restructuring, Controlling, Accounting, Reporting, Financial and Business Analysis, FP&A, Performance Management, Financial Projects Management, Compliance Management.
